SEARCH
Package lubiku.castleQuest.Model

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents.Entity
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Hero
public class Hero extends Entity

Hero

The Hero class represents a hero character in a game and it extends the "Entity" class and encapsulates the hero's behavior and interactions within the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero(GamePanel GAME_PANEL, KeyHandler keyHandler)

      Hero

      Creates a new instance of the Hero class.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The game panel where the hero will be displayed.
      keyHandler - The key handler for capturing user input.

  • Method Details

    • updateHero

      public void updateHero()

      updateHero

      Updates the hero based on the user's input and handles interactions with NPCs, objects, monsters, and events. Also handles sprite animation and health management.

    • interactNPC

      private void interactNPC(boolean contactNPC)

      interactNPC

      Handles the interaction between the hero and an NPC. If the hero is in contact with an NPC and the ENTER key is pressed, the game state switches to the dialogue state and the NPC speaks. If the hero is not in contact with an NPC and the ENTER key is pressed, the hero goes into attack mode.
      Parameters:
      contactNPC - True if the hero is in contact with an NPC, false otherwise.

    • contactMonster

      private void contactMonster(int i)

      contactMonster

      Handles the interaction between the hero and a monster. If the hero is in contact with a monster and the monster is not currently invisible, the hero's health is reduced by 1 and the hero becomes invisible.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the monster in the array.

    • damageMonster

      private void damageMonster(int monsterIndex)

      damageMonster

      Deals damage to the monster based on the hero's attack power. If the monster's health drops to 0 or below, the monster is marked as dying and the appropriate logs are generated.
      Parameters:
      monsterIndex - The index of the monster in the array.

    • attack

      private void attack()

      attack

      Performs the attack action of the hero, including updating the sprite animation, calculating attack area, checking monster collision, and dealing damage to the monster.

    • updateMonsterHealth

      private void updateMonsterHealth(int monsterIndex)

      updateMonsterHealth

      Updates the health of the monster based on the attack power of the hero.
      Parameters:
      monsterIndex - The index of the monster in the array.

    • drawHero

      public void drawHero(Graphics2D graphics2D)

      drawHero

      Draws the hero on the screen with the current sprite and additional information, such as the hero's name.
      Parameters:
      graphics2D - The graphics object to draw on.

    • pickUpObject

      public void pickUpObject(int index)

      pickUpObject

      Picks up an object at the specified index and performs the corresponding actions based on the object's type.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the object to be picked up.

    • removeObjectFromPane

      private void removeObjectFromPane(int index)

      removeObjectFromPane

      Removes the object at the specified index from the pane.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the object to be removed.
